programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E150
programme.desc: Boruto está empolgado para começar uma nova missão quando encontra uma Carta X rara que queria em seu bolso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E151
programme.desc: Boruto corre para salvar Tento, mas Shojoji, líder da Gangue Mujina, bloqueia seu caminho.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E152
programme.desc: Será realizado um treinamento em Ninjutsu Médico, e cada equipe deve mandar um representante. Sarada é escolhida pela equipe 7.

programme.desc: Tsubaki bola um plano para aprimorar as habilidades de sua equipe, em que eles competem para ver quem se sai melhor nas missões.

programme.desc: A equipe 7 é incumbida de dar apoio à Força Policial da Folha em uma missão de segurança.

programme.title: Knuckle and Shoot estão à espreita de Cheetu, mas ele muda de direção e desaparece. Killua e Gon sentem que alguém os está seguindo novamente.

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E25

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E26

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E27

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E28

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E29

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E30

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S2E37

programme.title: Vendo que era apenas um disfarce, Basile desafia os jogadores da Academia Real, apontando os tênis pontiagudos, dizendo que estão trapaceando. A partir daí, a moral da Academia Real e os jogadores começam a desmoronar.

programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin - S1E16

programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin - S1E18

programme.title: A perna de Hunter se machucou durante a luta cansativa com Raimon e ele tem quer ser retirado de campo, deixando a Academia Alia perdida. Xavier se lembra continuamente do dia em que conheceu Hunter.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin - S1E19

programme.title: A equipe de Raimon está juntando tudo depois da luta contra o Teikoku! Mas Someoka está com ciúmes por ele não ter uma técnica de hissatsu como Gouenji.
programme.desc: Super Onze - S1E3

programme.title: A partida contra o Occult está prestes a começar! Mas antes disso, Gouenji se junta à equipe e Someoka fica irritado com isso.
programme.desc: Super Onze - S1E4

programme.title: O Torneio de Futebol Fronteira está prestes a começar e Raimon enfrenta os assustadores saltadores do Nosei Junior High em seu primeiro jogo.
programme.desc: Super Onze - S1E5

programme.title: A missão para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas será que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptarão a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratégias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E44

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda estão presos no jogo! A única saída requer enfrentar o Dragão de Cinco Cabeças, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difícil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E45

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forçando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke força Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em público, forçando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E46

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi começa mal. As chances dele não melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E47

programme.title: Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam território no tabuleiro-grade.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E48

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacável de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaços, Yugi só tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S1E49

programme.title: Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milênio, e Yugi precisa defendê-lo em um duelo para recuperá-lo! No entanto, não se trata de um simples advinho. Ele é um inimigo familiar e formidável do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez não?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E1

programme.title: A misteriosa ameaça que controla Bandit Keith estilhaça o Enigma do Milênio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Será que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milênio e salvar o espírito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E2

programme.title: A origem de Duel Monsters é revelada! Usando a mágica do Colar do Milênio, a historiadora egípcia Ishizu Ishtar mostra a Kaiba como Duel Monsters era jogado milênios atrás!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E3

programme.title: O espírito do Enigma do Milênio percebe que suas memórias do Egito antigo se esvaíram, mas Téa o ajudará a descobrir os mistérios de seu passado! No entanto, a busca deles é interrompida pelo duelista dançarino Johnny Steps e seus monstros do rock!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E4

programme.title: Yugi descobre que era um faraó poderoso que salvou o mundo 5.000 anos atrás e agora deve salvá-lo de novo! No meio-tempo, Kaiba testa os poderes de Obelisco, o Atormentador, do Deck dos Deuses Egípcios, contra a fúria do Dragão Supremo de Olhos Azuis!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E5

programme.title: Joey é forçado a entrar num duelo e pode perder seu precioso Dragão Negro de Olhos Vermelhos para os Caçadores Raros. Embora Joey esmague seus inimigos com sua poderosa armada de monstros, eliminar pontos de vida não é o único caminho para a vitória...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E6

programme.title: Hora de dominar novas regras e monstros. Que comece o Torneio da Cidade da Batalha! No primeiro duelo do torneio, Yugi desafia o Caçador Raro para recuperar o Dragão Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E7

programme.title: Yugi se dá conta da estratégia do Caçador Raro de invocar o poderoso Exodia, mas é tarde demais para detê-lo! O Caçador Raro já tem quatro peças de Exodia na mão, e a quinta e última peça é a próxima carta do deck!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E8

programme.title: O duelista psíquico Espa Roba derrota Rex Raptor tão fácil quanto a um otário, e Joey é o próximo da lista! Quais são as chances de Joey, quando Espa Roba tem a habilidade telepática de ler todas as cartas na mão de Joey?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E9

programme.title: Joey descobre que a percepção extrassensorial de Espa Roba é uma farsa, mas ainda está sob seu controle! O Jinzo de Espa Roba não só massacra todos os monstros de Joey, mas fica mais poderoso a cada turno! A sorte de Joey chegou ao fim... Ou talvez não?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E10

programme.title: O duelista mágico Arkana transporta Yugi para a arena de duelos mais letal do mundo, em que o perdedor é enviado para o Reino das Sombras! Yugi tem que vencer esse duelo ou perderá muito mais que seu Mago Negro!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E11

programme.title: É Mago Negro contra Mago Negro! No entanto, enquanto Yugi só controla um Mago Negro, Arkana tem três em seu deck! Embora excedido em número, Yugi jamais desistirá, desde que continue confiando no coração das cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E12

programme.title: Para encarar o Mago Negro de Arkana, Yugi tira um coelho da cartola: a Pequena Maga Negra! É a batalha dos sexos, para determinar o verdadeiro mestre dos magos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E13

programme.title: O trapaceiro Weevil Underwood tece uma teia de mentiras para atrair Joey para um duelo desequilibrado! Weevil secretamente infesta o deck de Joey com um parasita que impede que Joey invoque monstros fortes!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E14

programme.title: Joey esmaga a Grande Mariposa Perfeitamente Suprema, mas Weevil solta a feroz Rainha dos Insetos, a joia suprema dos insetos, que fica mais forte com cada inseto horripilante que ela canibaliza! Será que a devastadora real de Will Weevil subjugará Joey?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E15

programme.title: Yugi enfrenta outro dos Caçadores Raros nefandos de Marik – o silencioso, mas mortal Strings! Strings detém todos os ataques de Yugi com Geleia Renascida, uma gosma escorregadia que ressuscita sempre que é destruída!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E18

programme.title: A primeira partida do torneio começou. Ambas os times jogam com determinação, mas Hyuga é ofuscada pelas habilidades de Tsubasa e fica enfurecida.

programme.title: Tsubaki visita a mansão onmyoji onde ela já treinou e planeja abrir uma porta proibida com o poder da Jóia.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: While investigating a case of stolen paintings, the roguishly charming and endlessly troublesome Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder. To prove his innocence, he must sift through a long list of suspects -- including his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Red (2010)
programme.desc: Retired CIA agents (Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich) reassemble for survival after the agency sends assassins to silence them and the secrets they carry.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes (2024)
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Resistance: 1942 (2021)
programme.desc: Caught behind enemy lines in 1942, a small group of resistance fighters broadcast a message of hope to fellow survivors over the radio as they try to avoid the Gestapo.

programme.title: Detainee 001
programme.desc: The complex legal story of John Walker Lindh, a young American who fell under the spell of the Taliban in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Citizen Bio
programme.desc: Exploring in depth the nascent biohacking movement and the unconventional scientists and researchers developing alternative medicines to prolong human life and eradicate incurable viruses and diseases.

programme.title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.sub-title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.desc: Lorine Padilla joins a street gang in the Bronx, N.Y., before becoming an activist and spiritual adviser.

programme.title: NYC Point Gods
programme.desc: Point guards including Rafer Alston, Kenny Anderson, Mark Jackson, Stephon Marbury, Kenny Smith and Rod Strickland hone their craft and taste for showmanship on New York Citys iconic playgrounds and in high school gyms in the 1980s and 90s.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: Recurring nightmares of the planet Mars lead a confused earthling into the center of an intergalactic conspiracy.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An Allied officer (Brad Pitt) and his team of Jewish soldiers join forces with a German actress and undercover agent to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Channel Sex News (2015)
programme.desc: When a beautiful TV producer swaps lives with a gorgeous highclass escort for a news story, they both take a wild trip into an alternate lifestyle as high stakes drama and steamy sex hit the 11 oclock news.

programme.title: Extra Ordinary (2019)
programme.desc: A woman who has supernatural abilities must save a possessed girl.

programme.title: Disquiet (2023)
programme.desc: A patient wakes to find he is trapped in a deserted hospital by forces that refuse to let him leave.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: I.S.S. (2023)
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Golda (2023)
programme.desc: During the Yom Kippur War in 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir must navigate overwhelming odds, a skeptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger as millions of lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Parallel (2024)
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: The Crossing Guard (1995)
programme.desc: A divorced jeweler (Jack Nicholson) tells the drunken driver (David Morse) who ran down his daughter hell be back in three days to kill him.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: A hot-shot Navy jet pilot (Tom Cruise) tangles with MiGs and flirts with a civilian astrophysicist (Kelly McGillis).

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Frank Millers Sin City (2005)
programme.desc: Lawmen, prostitutes (Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel), a hulking thug and other sordid characters run amok in a crime-ridden metropolis.

programme.title: The Nice Guys (2016)
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck private eye (Ryan Gosling) works with a hired enforcer (Russell Crowe) to investigate the disappearance of a young woman (Margaret Qualley) in 1977 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry (2015)
programme.desc: A half-human, half-robotic hybrid embarks on a bloody rampage through Moscow to save his kidnapped wife (Haley Bennett) from a madman (Danila Kozlovsky) and his army of thugs.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee (1986)
programme.desc: A rich reporter tours outback Australia with a crocodile hunter, then brings him to Manhattan.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon (1975)
programme.desc: A man robs a bank to pay for his lovers operation. It turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

programme.title: Flight of the Intruder (1991)
programme.desc: Two Navy pilots (Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson) hatch a rogue mission to bomb Hanoi with a special low-altitude plane.

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness (1996)
programme.desc: An Irish engineer (Val Kilmer) and a U.S. hunter (Michael Douglas) stalk two lions decimating a construction crew in East Africa.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas (2012)
programme.desc: With the consequences of their actions, individuals impact one anothers lives throughout the past, present and future.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: The Last Samurai (2003)
programme.desc: In the 1870s a Westerner (Tom Cruise) is caught in the middle of a battle between Japans emperor and the samurai.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney (Ben Affleck) and a recovering alcoholic (Samuel L. Jackson) have a car accident which escalates into an ongoing feud.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: The Nice Guys (2016)
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck private eye (Ryan Gosling) works with a hired enforcer (Russell Crowe) to investigate the disappearance of a young woman (Margaret Qualley) in 1977 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: A rancher (Christian Bale) and the captive outlaw (Russell Crowe) in his charge learn to respect each other on a dangerous journey to catch a train.

programme.title: Lens of Culture
programme.desc: Tai and Elton go on a cultural tour of Ghana, West Africa. They attend a traditional African dubar, and get official African names. They also get a lesson in authentic African cooking, and clothing design, and party at a Street Festival.

programme.title: Lens of Culture
programme.desc: Tai and Elton head to Harlem. They start with a Hip Hop tour complete with music, and graffiti art. Elton stops at Flamekeepers Hat Club, and Tai meets with some fashion insiders. They wrap up at Red-Rooster restaurant for live music.

programme.title: Lens of Culture
programme.desc: Tai and Elton head to Malibu to go Paragliding. Then Tai hosts a womens only brunch, while Elton heads to Leimert Park for some history, and culture. They wrap things up with a ride down Hollywood Boulevard on a Cycle Trolley.

programme.title: Lens of Culture
programme.desc: Tai and Elton hit the streets in the island of St. Thomas. They sample authentic island food from Mommas Restaurant, Gladys, and My Brothers Workshop Cafe. Then they head to The Black Power Theatre, for poetry and culture.

programme.title: Lens of Culture
